summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackIndulge in Essence Juicy Bomb Glossy Butter Balm. The eye-catching and trendy colors will take your lips to the next level! The colored lip balm formula melts perfectly onto your lips creating a glossy finish for smooth and plumped looking lips.
details: DetailsFeaturesSoft buttery lip balm formulaProvides a sensational fragranceLeaves lips nourished and hydratedComes in a beautiful color rangeFor a glossy finishFormulated WithoutAnimal by-productMicroplastic particlesParabensGlutenLactoseItem 2633172How To UseApply essence Juicy Bomb Glossy Butter Balm onto bare lips for a hint of color and gloss. Pair with your favorite essence lip liner or gloss for an added dimension. Pro Tip: The product is not retractable, only twist as needed.Ingredients01 One In A Melon: Diisostearyl Malate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Synthetic Wax, Triethylhexanoin, Polyisobutene, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aluminum Hydroxide, CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
how_to_use: Apply essence Juicy Bomb Glossy Butter Balm onto bare lips for a hint of color and gloss. Pair with your favorite essence lip liner or gloss for an added dimension. Pro Tip: The product is not retractable, only twist as needed.
ingredients: 01 One In A Melon: Diisostearyl Malate

reviews.headline: The best lip balm ever!
reviews.comments: Please do not stop making this lip balm! The grape one is the prettiest color on and it feels amazing.

reviews.headline: My kids and I like it
reviews.comments: We have purchased this clear one a few times.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and Glossy
reviews.comments: hydrating, glossy, and taste good. doesn't build up and leave a residue which i really like. is not long lasting though.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT!
reviews.comments: Absolutely live the color and longevity of moisture. Would love this product in flavors but definitely will buy again.bought in two colors so far.the quality of the packing is great. So many other brands I have tried have not held up and break.

reviews.headline: One in a melon flavor juicy bomb
reviews.comments: This product is great and has a nice shade, the one in a melon flavor smells amazing and leaves a nice tint! Maybe some more product inside but otherwise its great!

reviews.headline: Okay product.
reviews.comments: I wouldn't get again unless the put more product in the tube.

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: Nice bright color payoff and goes on soft and smooth.  The only downside is that once you twist it up you can't twist it back down againâ€¦so gotta be sure to only twist a little bit at a time

reviews.headline: I loved it so much I've been using all day and it's very pr.
reviews.comments: This lipstick is amazing it made my lips smooth hehe.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: This balm is so hydrating and the color is fabulous! It use it almost every day

reviews.headline: No brainer!
reviews.comments: I bought the pink 03 and the clear 06 on a whim because I saw they were only $3.99 each, and I had been needing a lip balm. These are absolutely perfect! The clear will be great for every day, and the pink will be fun to add a little bit of color For something special. I am not as lipstick girl at all, so this is perfect for me! They feel amazing on the lips, and the pink color is a really nice shade. Surprised at the color pay off! They are not sticky at all, and they feel so smooth and creamy on the lips. This is definitely my new favorite! And you can't beat the price!

reviews.headline: Better than expected!
reviews.comments: This is one of the best lip balms I've ever had! The formula is super shiny, not sticky, and truly nourishes the lips while looking like a high quality lipgloss. I got the clear shade and the pink shade, the pink shade is surprisingly really pigmented while still remaining sheer. This is a really great dupe for the YSL lip gloss, I wish essence made these in more shades, especially neutral pink ones!!!

reviews.headline: I would probably not buy this item again
reviews.comments: This item is non retractable and very oily on the lips could have been made with better formula

reviews.headline: packaging
reviews.comments:
I love the product. But careful cause it doesn't won't back down after rolling it up. 
 they really need to fix this you aren't aware of it till after it's too late

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: This product is amazing and it smells amazing and makes my lips look natural 10/10 would recommend

reviews.headline: I love this product it makes my lips moisturized
reviews.comments: I love this product it's amazing and smells great makes my lips look natural and it's good price 10/10 would recommend

reviews.headline: Love the shine.
reviews.comments: Has a great tint not over bearing with great shine. I like it plus it was on sale for under 3 dollars.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I would definitely buy one of each. Smells so great

reviews.headline: Great product, keep digging when you're "done"
reviews.comments:
I love this glossy balm, it feels amazing on the lips. My favorite is the coconut but, I also bought the pink & it is very pretty. The pink leaves a glossy pink finish & once the glossiness wears off, a pink stain that lasts on me for hours. They're both hydrating & moisturizing so on top of looking pretty they also leave my lips feeling good.
What I don't care for, is that you can't twist it back down if you twist too much up. I'm glad I read reviews first. I wish you could twist all the product out. When the container wouldn't twist out anymore product I had to use a mini cosmetic spatula to dig in and get the rest. There is way too much product remaining after the container stops twisting up. I would've just been throwing away money & good product.
Love it

reviews.headline: Waxy and dry
reviews.comments: Just a tube of waxy, crumbly lip stuff. Could not call this balm or gloss or juicy. It is so waxy and dry you can't glide it across your lips.

media.headline: Yes I love this product smells great and so smooth

faceoff_positive.comments:
I love this glossy balm, it feels amazing on the lips. My favorite is the coconut but, I also bought the pink & it is very pretty. The pink leaves a glossy pink finish & once the glossiness wears off, a pink stain that lasts on me for hours. They're both hydrating & moisturizing so on top of looking pretty they also leave my lips feeling good.
What I don't care for, is that you can't twist it back down if you twist too much up. I'm glad I read reviews first. I wish you could twist all the product out. When the container wouldn't twist out anymore product I had to use a mini cosmetic spatula to dig in and get the rest. There is way too much product remaining after the container stops twisting up. I would've just been throwing away money & good product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product, keep digging when you're "done"

faceoff_negative.comments: I read reviews that these were dups for the tarte maracuja lips and got 2 colors thinking they would be subtle hydrating colors. The purple one is actually PURPLE. Not subtle, but dark purple. The brown looks like chocolate on your lips. Unless you like bold bizarre lip colors I would not recommend. I will be returning both.
faceoff_negative.headline: The colors are awful!
